name: Doorsville
description:
Overview

You are Porter Daves.  A detective out of Doorsville City, tasked with his first murder case after being promoted to detective.  You must find out the true murder intent and the secrets that both Porter and the unknown killer have.  Troubled humanity, twisted psyche, and bowls of noodles to go around.  This is a new story that was created differently than some of my other projects which used the same story, but with different game engines.  This adaption of my story is done using fungus in unity.  

These were some of my original blueprints/intentions for the game.

  1. Discover your character: Over the course of the game you can choose which paths to take, people to interrogate, and people to kill.  Depending on your decision at these times can allow the player to learn a piece of not only Portor, his friends, enemies, but also Doorsville itself.
  2. Single Playthrough: Different than the other games that I've made, this one is meant to be played in a linear fashion.  Most of my other ideas exist with branching paths(most of which never get finished), however this is meant to only be played once.  The choices that are selected having permanent value and cannot make a different decision.
